+Try this example by running `run.sh` script.
+
+Basic configuration `gem.yaml`:
 
 ```yaml
 repo:
   type: gem
   storage:
     type: fs

+login:password would be a valid key:
+
+```bash
+export GEM_HOST_API_KEY=$(echo -n "hello:world" | base64)
